name: Telescope Words A-Z Quiz Series - E | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Here's how it works.  I give you three clues.  The first word begins with an E, the second word drops the E, and the final word drops the first letter of the second word.  Type JUST the longest word, starting with E.  For instance, if I give the clue "Beverage - Ice skating arena - Pen fluid", the answers would be "Drink - Rink - Ink", so you would type in JUST "Drink" as the answer.

Ready?  Good!

Antelope - Nation - Also
Computer messaging system - Cards/letters/bills/etc. - To be ill

Make corrections to - Fix - Finish

Remember, it starts with an E!
Wear away - Took a bus/train/car/etc. - Poem
Free yourself - Scenery - What a super hero might wear
questions.explanation:
Escape.

	Escape - Scape - Cape Scape is usually combined with other words to mean a particular scene; e.g. landscape, cityscape, etc.

questions.text: Property - One of the US's 50 - National art museum institute in UK
Support - Marriage mate - "Pussy", as in one's boyfriend
Flightless birds - Mauritius NATO country code or Spanish card game - We
